Message: Error in $: When parsing the record the key <key-name> was not present.
Explanation: when required keys are not supplied in request payload.
Recommendation: Look into API docs and find appropriate payload keys for that API

Explanation: when login info is not valid
Recommendation: Check for correct credentials like mobile number, country code, email, username and password
Check for correct provider name in '/v1/login' and '/v1/signup' request payload
Check whether provider you are sending request to is enabled in project conf
Check for correct hasura_id of a user. If still error exists user with that hasura_id might not exists
Activate your account through admin. And try logging in again.
User with credentials provided by you already exists. Try recovering the account or signup with different credentials
Try recovering your account or signup with different email id.

Explanation: when admin tries to assign role to user that does not exists
Recommendation: Add role by using '/v1/admin/create-role' API.

Explanation: when admin tries to add a role that already exists
Recommendation: Role already exists. Try creating another role.

Explanation: when user tries to resend verification token with an email which is not used to send verification token earlier
Recommendation: Check for email address provided by you is used for signing up earlier.
Check for correct email id.
Retry with password that satisfies minimum character condition.

Message: google client id is not present in the conf
Recommendation: Check for google client id included in project conf.

Message: facebook client id is not present in the conf
Recommendation: Check for facebook client id included in project conf

Message: given access token is not valid for the client id present in the conf (google and facebook)
Recommendation: Check for correct access token provided in request payload.

Message: Linkedin conf is not present in the conf
Recommendation: Check whether linkedin conf is provided in project conf

Message: Github conf is not present in the conf
Recommendation: Check whether github conf is provided in project conf

Message: no user found with specified token
Explanation: when user tries to verifies email with incorrect token
Recommendation: email verification token is incorrect.

Explanation: when token is very old or expired
Recommendation: Token is expired. Try resend verification token
Token is expired. Try resend verification token

Message: OTP is incorrect/verified/expired. Please get a new OTP
Recommendation: Try resend OTP

Explanation: when user tries to login without verifying mobile
Recommendation: Please verify your account by validating OTP provided

Message: mobile number is invalid or otp is verified/expired
Recommendation: Check for correct mobile number in request payload which is used for sending OTP.

Explanation: when admin tries to remove 'user' role.
Recommendation: You cannot delete "user" role

Message: user not found in password db
Explanation: when user does not have password set
Recommendation: User does not have password credentials or user was created with provider which does not requires password for authentication (Mobile only).
Internal Server error. Check auth logs for more details.
Exception received from notify service. Check notify logs for more details.
Exceptions from Google servers.

Message: no session information found; has to be logged in user
Recommendation: Please login as user and perform this action again.
User account is not verified hence he can't login. Try verifying account by resending verification token or OTP.

Explanation: when user tries to call invalid endpoint
Recommendation: The API url does not exists. Check for correct url. Please refer docs.
